item.title: How I 'created' this site
item.description: How it started> How it started # So as it currently stands I’m just going around, applying for internships here and there (fun little story how hard I’m making it for myself - France without french, we’ll see how that works out), and I thought it would be kind of good to finally have a better looking personal website, potentially including a blog (See?
